Text:
If you are having a problem with hosting a Listen server with Sven Co-op,
There are 2 ways of fixing this:

1st Way:
use HLDS to host a game, and change the NETWORK to LAN

2nd Way:
For Listen servers go to-
GAME_DIRECTORYsvencoop
Open "game.cfg" file
and add this text to the last line:
WITH THE ALL THE "s
"sv_lan"		"1"
Thank you very much! The game is godlike!

CD KEY:
Just fill in with "A" all the way!
downloading now... does anybody know how to use the game "cry of fear"?
How do you install?  I am running a Windows 7 dell inspiron 6400, intel core duo 1.7 Ghz processor with 2 gigs of ram.
